title: LUCKY CRAFT Lucky Craft Pointer 100 '
description: Lucky Craft pointers are incredibly productive Baits that feature an extremely low center of gravity and special brass weights which cause the pointers to actually vibrate on the pause! absolutely deadly with any type of stop-and-go retrieve, pointers are widely considered to be Miracle Baits since they have the power to entice strikes from bass, musky, trout, and almost every other gamefish species.
